## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G06950](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G06950)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AHBP-1B, AtTGA2, TGA2</u>
- **Gene Name:** TGACG sequence-specific binding protein 2
- **Description:**   bZIP transcription factor family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
